name: COMMERCIAL_WEEKEND
description: Typical commercial office building load profile for a weekend day
notes: Significantly reduced load compared to weekday (50% of weekday peak)
Flat profile with minimal variation throughout the day
Base load maintains HVAC setback, security, and emergency systems
No significant ramp-up or peak periods
Some daytime increase (noon) if weekend maintenance staff present
Normalized to weekend peak value of 0.5 (50% of weekday operations)
Based on typical unoccupied office building load patterns
